name: Bullet Fucker
description:
In a world where the police are no longer able to do anything. Comes a hero who will save us all!

A hard as nails shooter taking you back to the good old days of old skool shooters mixed with modern day speed & action. A series of metal tracks inspired to accompany the game along with more limbs, blood & decapitation than you can shake a stick at.

Shoot your way through hordes of Zombies & Demons to reach your ultimate goal. Traverse your home town, a movie set & of course.... THE MOON!
Claim your freedom whilst practicing your 2nd amendment rights!

INCLUDES: 
SURVIVAL MODE!
KEEP IT UP MODE!

"THIS GAME MADE ME WANNA CUM" - DUKE NUKEM

"..............................!" - DOOM GUY

"THIS IS GAME OF THE YEAR!" - AARON WISE

"THIS GUY DOESN'T NEED CQC" - SOLID SNAKE

Don't hesitate. Jump in & start slaying now! 
**This game will be updated with new levels, new weapons & new enemies**

There is a secret level hidden within the main game. Let me know if you find it!

CONTROLS:
WASD - MOVE
LEFT CLICK - SHOOT
MOUSE - LOOK
SPACE - JUMP
PAGE UP - INCREASE MOUSE SENSITIVITY
PAGE DOWN - DECREASE MOUSE SENSITIVITY

Extract the Zip folder & double click the .exe to launch.
